actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow penalty-free withdrawals from individual retirement accounts for certain institutional care expenses.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow penalty-free withdrawals from individual retirement accounts used to pay expenses for: (1) care at a skilled nursing facility; (2) care at an intermediate care facility; and (3) any other licensed long-term care facility which provides nursing or custodial care.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow penalty-free withdrawals from individual retirement accounts for certain institutional care expenses.
